messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] some new unschooling articles
messages.msgSnippet: Hey Teri, I saw an article you did in the latest edition of HEM yesterday. Good job. Valerie in Tacoma Hi all, I have a couple of new articles up that may
messages.messageBody:
Hey Teri,

I saw an article you did in the latest edition of HEM yesterday. Good job.

Valerie in Tacoma

Hi all, I have a couple of new articles up that may interest some of you.

Maybe we did watch too much TV during the Olympics ... but it was worth it!
http://www.themestream.com/gspd_browse/browse/view_article.gsp?c_id=267022

This one is the start of my new column at Eclectic Homeschooling Online
http://eho.org/cunschool.htm

Thanks
Teri
